page.title: 12Getting ready for school
page.content: My alarm went off at 6.45. Very tired I slowly got up and put my light on and read my comic till 7.30.All the time. I was listening to my radio. I got up and put my brother's light on because he never wakes up on time to go to school. Then I went down stairs and put the kettle on and put 2 pieces of bread in the toaster, got my plate and peanut butter out.My mum came down stairs in her dressing gown because she does not work on a Friday. I went up stairs and got dressed while Mum got the breakfast and a cup of tea and I got my bag ready. My brother had just finished his breakfast.Then I cleaned my teeth went downstairs and said "bye Mum don't forget this afternoon"I went up the hill and met my friend and we walked to school.
